you_are_using_the_latest_version!: You are using the latest version!
wind_info: Wind speed is measured by averaging wind speeds over a period of time. Gusts are sudden bursts of wind typically lasting under twenty seconds.
visibility_info: Visibility measures the distance at which prominent objects can be seen against the sky or horizon. Visibility can be affected by precipitation, fog, dust, smoke, or haze.
humidity_info: Relative humidity is the percentage of water vapor present in the air compared to the maximum amount the air can hold at a given temperature.
humidity_info_2: Dew point is what the temperature would need to be cooled to in order to achieve a relative humidity of 100%.
uv_index_info: The UV index measures the strength of the sun's ultraviolet (UV) radiation. It is on a scale of 0 to 11, with the higher values indicating stronger UV radiation.
uv_index_info_2: UV radiation can cause sunburn, skin cancer, and eye damage. The higher the UV index, the greater the risk of these problems
uv_index_info_3: 1-2: Low. no protection needed. You can safely stay outside using minimal sun protection.
uv_index_info_4: 3-7: Moderate to High. Protection needed. Seek shade during late morning through mid-afternoon. When outside, generously apply broad-spectrum SPF-15 or higher suncreen on exposed skin, and wear protective clothing, a wide-brimmed hat, and sunglasses.
uv_index_info_5: 8+: Very High to Extreme. Extra protection needed. Be carefull outside, especially during late morning through mid-afternoon. If your shadow is shorter than you, seek shade and wear protective clothing, a wide-brimmed hat, and sunglasses, and generously apply a minimum of SPF-15, broad-spectrum sunscreen on exposed skin.
sunset_rise_info: Sunrise: When the sun fully appears above the horizon. This varies depending on location, time of year, and time zone.
sunset_rise_info_2: Sunset: When the sun completely disappears below the horizon. This varies depending on location, time of year, and time zone.
sunset_rise_info_3: Dawn: When the first visible light of the day appears before sunrise.
sunset_rise_info_4: Dusk: The darkest stage of twilight before the last visible light disappears.
pressure_info: Atmospheric pressure, also known as air pressure or baromatic pressure, is the downward pressure exerted by the earth's atmosphere. This app uses Mean Sea Level Pressure (MSLP).
pressure_info_2: Abnormal atmospheric pressure may cause headaches, joint pain, fatigue, and other effects.
air_quality_satisfactory: La qualitat d'aire es considera satisfactòria i la contaminació atmosfèrica suposa poc o gens de risc.
air_quality_acceptable: La qualitat d'aire és acceptable; ara bé, alguns contaminants poden ser una preocupació per a un petit grup de gent inusualment sensible a la contaminació atmosfèrica.
sensitive_groups_health_effects: Els grups de gent més sensibles poden patir efectes sobre la salut. El públic general no hauria de ser afectat.
health_effects_public: Tothom podria començar a patir efectes sobre la salut; col·lectius més sensibles poden patir-ne de més severs.
emergency_conditions: Alerta per salut en condicions d'emergència. Tota la població en pot sortir mal parada.
uv_index_satisfactory: L'índex UV és satisfactori, que vol dir que hi ha poc o gens de risc per radiació ultraviolada.
conditions_low_risk: Les condicions són, generalment, de baix risc, que vol dir que l'exposició als rajos ultraviolats suposa una amenaça mínima.
low_exposure_level: Baix nivell d'exposició amb riscos mínims d'afectació per radiació ultraviolada, adequat per a la majoria.
moderate_risk_sun_exposure: Risc moderat d'afectació per exposició al sol sense protecció, es recomanen mesures preventives.
high_risk_sun_exposure: Risc alt d'afectació per exposició al sol sense protecció, calen mesures preventives.
very_high_risk_sun_exposure: Risc molt alt d'afectació per exposició al sol sense protecció, calen precaucions addicionals.
extreme_risk_sun_exposure: Risc extrem d'afectació per exposició al sol sense protecció, cal una protecció completa.
warming_temp_trend_1: Warming expected over the next few days.
warming_temp_trend_2: Temperatures will rise soon, get ready for some heat!
warming_temp_trend_3: Looks like it's going to get warmer this week.
cooling_temp_trend_1: Cooling expected over the next few days.
cooling_temp_trend_2: Temperatures are dropping soon, stay warm!
cooling_temp_trend_3: It's going to get cooler in the coming days.
cooling_temp_trend_4: Expect a chilly breeze over the next days.
stable_temp_trend_1: Stable temperatures expected in the next few days.
stable_temp_trend_2: No big temperature changes ahead, steady weather.
stable_temp_trend_3: Temperatures are holding steady for now.
stable_temp_trend_4: Expect stable weather without much change.
check_your_internet_connection_try_again: Check your internet connection and try again.
There might be an API error.
contributors_sub: View people who contributed to this project
get_clothing_suggestions: Get your Clothing and Activity Suggestions
show_alerts_home_page_sub: Mostra alertes meteorològiques a la pàgina principal
moon_info: Lluna nova: Quan la lluna no és visible perquè es troba entre la Terra i el Sol. Il·luminació: 0%.
moon_info_2: Lluna creixent: Quan un petit tall de la lluna es torna visible, creixent més cada nit després de la lluna nova. Il·luminació: 1%–49%.
moon_info_3: Quart creixent: Quan la meitat de la cara de la lluna està il·luminada. Passa aproximadament una setmana després de la lluna nova. Il·luminació: ~50%.
moon_info_4: Gibosa creixent: Quan més de la meitat de la cara de la lluna està il·luminada pel Sol i tira cap a la lluna plena. Il·luminació: 51–99%.
moon_info_5: Lluna plena: Quan tota la cara de la lluna està il·luminada pel Sol formant un cercle complet. Il·luminació: 100%.
moon_info_6: Gibosa minvant: Quan la lluna comença a encongir-se després de la lluna plena, però més de la meitat queda il·luminada. Il·luminació: 99%–51%.
moon_info_7: Quart minvant: Quan la meitat de la cara de la lluna es torna a il·luminar. Passa aproximadament una setmana després de la lluna plena. Il·luminació: ~50%.
moon_info_8: Lluna minvant: Quan només un petit tall de la lluna queda visible abans de lluna nova. Il·luminació: 49%–1%.
moon_info_9: Il·luminació: El percentatge de la superfície de la lluna que és enllumenat pel Sol. Depèn de la fase de la lluna.
dynamic_colors_sub: Fes servir els colors del fons de pantalla
font_size_sub: La mida de la font només afectarà on calgui
swipe_between_locations_sub: Llisca a la dreta o l'esquerra per canviar l'ubicació
swipe_threshold_help_sub: El llindar defineix la distància mínima que s'ha de lliscar perquè es reconegui. Un llindar més baix fa que el lliscament es detecti més fàcilment, mentre que amb un de més alt cal lliscar més alegrement.
creator: Creador
export_data_sub: Exporta tota la teva configuració, ubicacions i les últimes dades meteorològiques recollides. Literalment tot!
import_data_sub: Advertència: En importar s'esborraran les dades actuals de l'aplicació
froggy_summary_sub: Afegeix descripcions relacionades amb granotes. Només disponible en anglès
default_location_delete_snack: No pots esborrar la ubicació per defecte
temp_animation_sub_pref: Compta les temperatures de principi a final
info_home_location_tip: Cal que desis les ubicacions per tenir-les com a ubicació per defecte
weather_model_info_2: Combines all weather models from this into a seamless prediction
max_items_4: You can only hide up to 4 items
max_items_3: You can only hide up to 3 items
used_app_storage_info_sub: Storage shows how much of the available space the app is using for saved locations. If it reaches 100%, you can no longer save additional locations
aqi_info_us: The US AQI (Air Quality Index) is a measurement used to communicate the level of air pollution. It ranges from 0 to 500, with higher values indicating worse air quality.
aqi_info_eu: The EU AQI (Air Quality Index) is a measurement used to communicate the level of air pollution in the European Union. It is divided into five levels, from 'Good' to 'Very Poor,' based on the concentration of key pollutants.
update_weather_data_sub: Automatically update the weather data if it's outdated when a location is clicked
delete_locations_support_sub: This action removes every saved location except your default location. Use this if your saved locations are not visible, are duplicating, or experiencing any other bugs
show_summary_toggle_sub: Show a brief summary of the weather
temperature_wind_pressure_visibility_pre: Temperature, wind, pressure, visibility, precipitation, time, AQI
activity_suggestions_daytip_humidity_3: 🧴 The air is dry. Moisturize your skin and drink plenty of water to stay hydrated.
activity_suggestions_daytip_humidity_4: 💧 Low humidity may cause dry skin or irritation. Keep a water bottle handy and avoid overexposure.
no_notification_when_a_new_version_is_re: Don't show a notification when a new version is released.
precipitation_expected_to_continue: Precipitation is expected to continue for the next few hours
edit_location_error_sub: Please fill in the field or reset it
use_device_compass: Fes servir el compàs del dispositiu
use_device_compass_sub: Rota la fletxa del vent amb base a l'orientació a la vida real del telèfon
froggy_insights_sub: Mostra previsions amb un format alegre
show_froggy_sub: Exposa imatges d'en Froggy amb base a les condicions meteorològiques
primary_color_sub: Tria un color base per generar el tema
material_scheme_only_sub: Desactiva els efectes meteorològics: fa ús del tema Material predeterminat
bulletstempOptions_1: Expect a daytime range from {min}° to {max}°.
bulletstempOptions_3: Today's high will reach around {max}° after a cooler start.
bulletsUVOptions_2: Strong UV expected near {uvTime} — sun protection recommended.
bulletsUVOptions_3: High UV levels around {uvTime} could pose a risk outdoors.
bulletsHUMIDITYOptions_1: {humidity}% humidity with a dew point of {dewpoint}° by {time}.
bulletsHUMIDITYOptions_2: Feels humid later — dew point near {dewpoint}° at {time}.
bulletsHUMIDITYOptions_3: Sticky conditions expected by {time} with {humidity}% humidity.
bulletsWINDOptions_1: Breezy conditions with winds up to {windSpeed} {windUnit}.
bulletsWINDOptions_2: Wind picks up during the day, reaching {windSpeed} {windUnit}.
bulletsAQIOptions_1: Air quality is poor right now — consider limiting time outside.
bulletsAQIOptions_2: Good air quality at the moment.
summary_headlines_3: Rough weather ahead with storms likely
summary_headlines_4: Rain showers likely through the day
summary_headlines_5: Pack an umbrella — rain is on the way
summary_headlines_6: Expect a damp and drizzly forecast
summary_headlines_8: Cloudy and cool throughout the day
summary_headlines_11: Hot and blazing under clear skies
summary_headlines_12: Heat and sunshine dominate the forecast
summary_headlines_13: Bright and sunny — UV is high
summary_headlines_15: Clear skies with a UV warning
summary_headlines_20: Windy and brisk as the day begins
summary_headlines_21: Hold onto your hat — it's breezy
summary_headlines_25: Pleasant and calm start to the day
summary_headlines_26: Fair weather to kick things off
summary_suffixes_6: expect gusts later in the day
precip_info: Rain amount describes how much rain is expected, typically given in millimeters (mm) or inches. It helps indicate the intensity of rainfall — from light showers to heavy downpours.
precip_info_2: Rain probability shows the chance of precipitation occurring at a given time and location, expressed as a percentage. For example, a 70% chance means rain is likely in that area.
precip_info_3: Rain duration indicates the total number of hours during the day that rain is expected. This helps estimate how long the weather might stay wet or overcast.
precip_info_4: Rain intensity measures how heavy the rain is during a given period, typically classified as light, moderate, or heavy. Heavier rainfall can lead to flooding or reduced visibility.
model_saved_snack: Model saved. Please refresh the weather
insights_sub_1: It's getting colder this week — temperatures drop by {tempDiff}° by the weekend.
insights_sub_2: Warming up ahead! Expect a rise of {tempDiff}° by the weekend.
insights_sub_3: Temperatures stay mostly stable this week.
insights_sub_4: High chance of rain mid-week — especially on {peakDay}.
insights_sub_5: Scattered showers possible on a few days this week.
insights_sub_6: Low rain chances all week — enjoy the dry spell!
insights_sub_7: Heatwave alert: {hotDays} days over {heatTemp}° are coming this week.
insights_sub_8: Expect a hot day or two — highs reaching {heatTemp}°.
insights_sub_9: No extreme heat expected this week.
insights_sub_10: It will feel stickier later this week as humidity climbs.
insights_sub_11: A drier air mass is moving in — humidity levels drop.
insights_sub_12: Humidity remains fairly consistent this week.
insights_sub_14: Breezy days ahead — nothing too wild though.
insights_sub_15: Calm winds for most of the week.
insights_sub_16: Pleasant week ahead — {sunnyDays} days of clear, comfortable weather!
insights_sub_17: Mixed skies this week, but still decent for outdoor plans.
insights_sub_18: Cloudy skies can trap heat overnight — warmer mornings ahead.
insights_sub_19: Wind chill can make {temp}° feel like {feelliketemp}° — dress accordingly.
insights_sub_20: A single thunderstorm can drop over 30 million gallons of water.
insights_sub_21: Sunlight can be more intense after a rainy day — wear sunscreen.
insights_sub_22: Big temperature swings expected today — dress in layers! ({tempdiff}°)
insights_sub_23: Temperatures stay fairly stable through the day.
insights_sub_24: High UV levels expected — especially around midday. Don’t forget sunscreen!
insights_sub_25: Moderate UV levels today — still good to take precautions.
insights_sub_26: Low UV risk today — enjoy the outdoors!
insights_sub_27: Strong winds expected during certain hours — secure loose items outside.
insights_sub_28: Wind speeds will fluctuate a lot today — keep an extra layer handy.
insights_sub_29: Mostly calm winds throughout the day.
insights_sub_30: Humidity levels will vary significantly today — it may feel muggy at times.
insights_sub_31: Consistent humidity levels expected — comfortable air throughout the day.
insights_sub_32: Mostly cloudy skies for most of the day — limited sunshine.
insights_sub_33: Clear skies dominate — great day for outdoor activities!
insights_sub_34: Mixed clouds and sun throughout the day.
insights_sub_35: High chance of rain during some hours — keep an umbrella nearby!
insights_sub_36: Spotty rain showers possible during parts of the day.
